## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install fh_saas in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure fh_saas package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to fh_saas
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/abhisheksreesaila/fh-saas):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/abhisheksreesaila/fh-saas.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/abhisheksreesaila/fh-saas)

``` sh
$ conda install -c abhisheksreesaila fh_saas
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/fh-saas/)

``` sh
$ pip install fh_saas
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/abhisheksreesaila/fh-saas)’s
[pages](https://abhisheksreesaila.github.io/fh-saas/). Additionally you
can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/abhisheksreesaila/fh-saas) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/fh-saas/) respectively.
